title: Coaches vs. Agents, the Keys to Negotiating, and Baseball’s Return With Sports Agent Scott Boras | Flying Coach With Steve Kerr and Pete Carroll
description:
Steve and Pete are joined by Pete’s former college housemate and baseball super agent Scott Boras to chat about helping players overcome fear, the similarities and differences between coaches and agents, and understanding how to negotiate for a player. Next they get into the necessary measures being taken to begin the process of bringing sports back amid the COVID-19 outbreak. 
Hosts: Steve Kerr and Pete Carroll
Guest: Scott Boras 
This show is raising money for COVID-19 relief. You can help! Donate here!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
